description: --- tags: - image-to-3d - pytorch_model_hub_mixin - model_hub_mixin library_name: mast3r repo_url: --- ## Grounding Image Matching in 3D with MASt3R # License The code is distributed under the CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 License. For more information, check CHECKPOINTS_NOTICE. # Model info Gihub page: | Modelname | Training resolutions | Head | Encoder | Decoder | |-------------|----------------------|------|---------|---------| | MASt3R_ViTLarge_BaseDecoder_512_catmlpdpt_nonmetric | 512x384, 512x336, 512x288, 512x256, 512x160 | CatMLP+DPT | ViT-L | ViT-B | # How to use First, install mast3r. To load the model:
model_explanation_gemini: Generates 3D representations from 2D images using a ViT-L encoder and ViT-B decoder with CatMLP+DPT head for image-to-3D tasks.
